/-- Application of a natural transformation at a fixed object,
as group homomorphism -/
@[simps]
def appLinearMap (X : C) : (F ⟶ G) →ₗ[R] F.obj X ⟶ G.obj X where
  toFun α := α.app X

  map_smul' _ _ := rfl
